summary: Stand-Alone re-textured plate armour, you can find a set on the gear table at The Palace of Kings.
descriptionHtml:
Basic Information and Features

This is a mod made for those who want to have heavy armour in the Stormcloak side, for now it's just a simple stand-alone retexture of steel plate armour, I have plans to make a caped version and different metal versions as I get more experienced with modding. Right now there's only one set on the gear table at The Palace of Kings, but I plan to figured out how to make it available for purchase only from the blacksmith in Windhelm. you can get yourself a set though console commands if you don't want to steal the existing set off the table.

How To Install

Installing is a simple matter of moving the .esp and .bsa files to the data file. Make sure to check it in the load mod section and then enjoy :)
author: GavynNuva
